accent.$description: Used for accents such as hover effects on <DropdownMenuItem>, <SelectItem>...etc

accent-foreground.$description: Used for accents such as hover effects on <DropdownMenuItem>, <SelectItem>...etc

destructive.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">

destructive-foreground.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">

information-foreground.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">

input.$description: Border color for inputs such as <Input />, <Select />, <Textarea />

popover.$description: Background color for popovers such as <DropdownMenu />, <HoverCard />, <Popover />

popover-foreground.$description: Foreground color for popovers such as <DropdownMenu />, <HoverCard />, <Popover />

success.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">

success-border.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">

success-foreground.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">

warning.$description: Used for destructive actions such as <Button variant="destructive">
